articles.title: First case of Delta-plus, 'double-whammy' variant of COVID, detected in Louisiana - NOLA.com
articles.description: The Delta variant of COVID-19 has spawned a new, troubling variant known as Delta-plus that has been identified for the first time in Louisiana, according to officials at Ochsner Health.
